title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions: Unleash your inner engineer with Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers! This Science & Engineering Kit allows you to build 20 different models while learning about force, load, compression, and tension. Winner of the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, this kit in Blue color includes 285 pieces and a 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide. Dive into the world of structural engineering with columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary elements. Explore different types of forces like tension, compression, shear, and bending, and build various bridge types such as truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges. Perfect for intermediate skill levels, this kit teaches mechanical physics, structural engineering, and more. Get ready to unleash your creativity and understanding of strength and stability with Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers!

Unleash your inner engineer with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! This award-winning kit, complete with the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, allows you to build 20 different models using 285 pieces. Dive into the world of force, load, compression, and tension as you construct columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenaries. Explore various types of forces like tension, compression, shear, and bending while building truss bridges, arch bridges, cantilever bridges, rope bridges, and suspension bridges.

Perfect for intermediate skill levels, this kit includes a 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide to help you through each step. Learn essential concepts of mechanical physics, structural engineering, and the strength and stability of structures. Optimize for safety and cost as you experiment with the strength and stiffness of materials. Get ready for a hands-on learning experience that will spark your creativity and engineering prowess. Get your Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit today and start building your own architectural marvels!

With a comprehensive 36-page illustrated experiment manual and Assembly guide, you'll learn about mechanical physics, structural engineering, strength and stability of structures, and optimization for safety and cost. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to discover the art and science behind building bridges and skyscrapers!
